title: Bug 91114[jdtparser] Parser error on System.out.printf("..." + (afterbefore) + "...")
description: Following code fragment:class Foo {public void bar () {long before = 0;long after = 0;System.out.println("... " + (before  after) + " ...");}}leads to following parser error[...].java:25 [error] Syntax error on token "", invalid AssignmentOperatorSystem.out.println("... " + (before  after) + " ...");Problems seems to vanish when I rename the before variable.
